abstract:
Data from the online Austronesian Basic Vocabulary Database
Data taken from the online version ABVD when it was still published under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license.
name: Greenhill et al. 2008
sources: Greenhill, S.J., Blust. R, & Gray, R.D. (2008). The Austronesian Basic Vocabulary Database: From Bioinformatics to Lexomics. Evolutionary Bioinformatics, 4:271-283.
